Name: Cherusci
History: The Cherusci were one of the Germanic tribes of continental Europe. With heavy infantry and cavalry, German warriors valiantly resisted Roman campaigns of conquest.

Factions.Name: Germans
Factions.Description: The Germanic tribes of mainland Europe.

Technologies.Name: Schlacht im Teutoburger Wald
Technologies.History: The Germans employed successful hit and run tactics against the Romans. Result: 3 legions gone

Heroes.Name: Arminius
Heroes.History: In the battle of the Teutoburg Forest Arminius led an alliance of Germanic tribes to victory over the Romans. Romans lost three legions in the battle.

CivBonuses.Name: Wooden Construction
CivBonuses.Description: Structures −20% build time, −20% health, and −20% capture points.

CivBonuses.Name: Disorganized tribes
CivBonuses.History: The Germans were not an organized society at this time, they were divieded into numerous small tribes.

TeamBonuses.Name: Proto-Germanic engineering
TeamBonuses.History: Advanced the technology of their people even during wartime.
